Subject: If I Can Make a Video Game, So Can You!
Description: Come learn from David Gazdowicz about how he created modern retro-style video games from the ground up, including game design, graphic design, cabinet fabrication and hardware installation. If he can do it, so can you!  Speakers include:David Gazdowicz - Track: Videogaming  - Duration: 1 hour and 50 minutes - Audio/video needs: Projector

Subject: Opening Up Retro-Style Video Cabinets
Description: David Gazdowicz created modern retro-style video games from the ground up. Join David in the lobby as he opens up the cabinets so you can poke around a bit at the inner workings!  Speakers include:David Gazdowicz - Track: Videogaming  - Duration: 50 minutes - Audio/video needs: none
